subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Wright scored 21 points and Greg Monroe had 12 points and 12 assists to lead No. 7 Georgetown to a 79-70 victory over host Providence on Tuesday night.
snippet: Chris Wright scored 21 points and Greg Monroe had 12 points and 12 assists to lead No. 7 Georgetown to a 79-70 victory over host Providence on Tuesday night.
